declarations.comments: A mutable metric store.
declarations.title: Store

declarations.comments: Different types of metric samplers.
declarations.title: MetricSampler

declarations.comments:
Value of different metric samplers. Counter and Gauge values are their Int values.
Histogram, Meter, and Timer values are the summary records of their values.
declarations.title: Value

declarations.comments: Creates a new, empty metric store.
declarations.title: newStore

declarations.comments:
Registers a metric sampler with the given name, to the given metric store.
Returns true if registration succeeds, false if registration fails because another metric sampler
is already registered with the given name.
declarations.title: register

declarations.comments:
Registers and returns a metric sampler with the given name, to the given metric store if another one
is not registered with the given name. Else, returns the metric sampler registered with the given name.
declarations.title: registerOrGet

declarations.comments: Returns a metric sampler registered to the given metric store with the given name.
declarations.title: get

declarations.comments:
Register a Counter with the given name to the given store.
Returns true if registration succeeds, false if registration fails because another metric sampler
is already registered with the given name.
declarations.title: registerCounter

declarations.comments:
Register a Gauge with the given name to the given store.
Returns true if registration succeeds, false if registration fails because another metric sampler
is already registered with the given name.
declarations.title: registerGauge

declarations.comments:
Register a Histogram with the given name to the given store.
Returns true if registration succeeds, false if registration fails because another metric sampler
is already registered with the given name.
declarations.title: registerHistogram

declarations.comments:
Register a Meter with the given name to the given store.
Returns true if registration succeeds, false if registration fails because another metric sampler
is already registered with the given name.
declarations.title: registerMeter

declarations.comments:
Register a Timer with the given name to the given store.
Returns true if registration succeeds, false if registration fails because another metric sampler
is already registered with the given name.
declarations.title: registerTimer

declarations.comments:
Creates, registers and returns a Counter with the given name to the given store.
If a Counter is already registered with the given name, returns it.
Throws exception if a non-Counter metric sampler is already registered with the given name.
declarations.title: createOrGetCounter

declarations.comments:
Creates, registers and returns a Gauge with the given name to the given store.
If a Gauge is already registered with the given name, returns it.
Throws exception if a non-Gauge metric sampler is already registered with the given name.
declarations.title: createOrGetGauge

declarations.comments:
Creates, registers and returns a Histogram with exponential decay sampling, with the given name to the given store.
If a Histogram is already registered with the given name, returns it.
Throws exception if a non-Histogram metric sampler is already registered with the given name.
declarations.title: createOrGetHistogramWithExponentialDecaySampling

declarations.comments:
Creates, registers and returns a Histogram with uniform sampling, with the given name to the given store.
If a Histogram is already registered with the given name, returns it.
Throws exception if a non-Histogram metric sampler is already registered with the given name.
declarations.title: createOrGetHistogramWithUniformSampling

declarations.comments:
Creates, registers and returns a Meter with the given name to the given store.
If a Meter is already registered with the given name, returns it.
Throws exception if a non-Meter metric sampler is already registered with the given name.
declarations.title: createOrGetMeter

declarations.comments:
Creates, registers and returns a Timer with the given name to the given store.
If a Timer is already registered with the given name, returns it.
Throws exception if a non-Timer metric sampler is already registered with the given name.
declarations.title: createOrGetTimer

declarations.comments: Samples the value of a metric sampler.
declarations.title: sampleOne

declarations.comments: Samples the value of all metric samplers in the given store.
declarations.title: sample

declarations.comments: A mutable, integer valued counter.
declarations.title: Counter

declarations.comments: Creates a new counter with zero value.
declarations.title: new

declarations.comments: Returns the current value of the counter.
declarations.title: read

declarations.comments: Resets the counter value to zero.
declarations.title: reset

declarations.comments: Increments the counter value by the given count.
declarations.title: inc

declarations.comments: An integer valued metric.
declarations.title: Gauge

declarations.comments: Creates a new gauge given the underlying measurement function.
declarations.title: new

declarations.comments: Returns the current value of the gauge.
declarations.title: read

declarations.comments: A mutable distribution of values in a stream of data.
declarations.title: Histogram

declarations.comments:
Summary of the distribution of the measurements in the histogram.
Contains:

- min: minimum
- max: maximum
- sum: sum
- variance: variance
- mean: mean
- stdDev: standard deviation
- count: count
- median: median
- p75: 75th percentile
- p95: 95th percentile
- p99: 99th percentile
- p999: 99.9th percentile
declarations.title: Summary

declarations.comments: Creates a new histogram with exponential decay sampling with given size and alpha.
declarations.title: newWithExponentialDecaySampling

declarations.comments: Creates a new histogram with uniform sampling with the given size.
declarations.title: newWithUniformSampling

declarations.comments: Clears the histogram.
declarations.title: clear

declarations.comments: Updates the histogram with the given measurement.
declarations.title: update

declarations.comments:
Returns the percentiles of the measurements in the histogram for the given percentiles array.
Returns 'Nothing' if there are no measurements.
declarations.title: percentiles

declarations.comments:
Returns the variance of the measurements in the histogram.
Returns 'Nothing' if there are no measurements.
declarations.title: variance

declarations.comments:
Returns the mean of the measurements in the histogram.
Returns 'Nothing' if there are no measurements.
declarations.title: mean

declarations.comments:
Returns the standard deviation of the measurements in the histogram.
Returns 'Nothing' if there are no measurements.
declarations.title: stdDev

declarations.comments:
Returns the minimum of the measurements in the histogram.
Returns 'Nothing' if there are no measurements.
declarations.title: min

declarations.comments:
Returns the maximum of the measurements in the histogram.
Returns 'Nothing' if there are no measurements.
declarations.title: max

declarations.comments:
Returns the sum of the measurements in the histogram.
Returns 'Nothing' if there are no measurements.
declarations.title: sum

declarations.comments: Returns the count of measurements in the histogram.
declarations.title: count

declarations.comments: Returns the summary of the measurements in the histogram.
declarations.title: read

declarations.comments: A mutable metric which measures the rate at which a set of events occur.
declarations.title: Meter

declarations.comments:
Summary of the measurements in the meter. Contains:

- count: count
- m1: one minute rate
- m5: five minute rate
- m15: fifteen minute rate
- mean: mean rate
declarations.title: Summary

declarations.comments: Create a new meter.
declarations.title: new

declarations.comments: Marks the meter with occurrance of n events.
declarations.title: markN

declarations.comments: Marks the meter with occurrance of one event.
declarations.title: mark

declarations.comments: Returns the fifteen minute moving-average rate of the events recorded by the meter.
declarations.title: fifteenMinuteRate

declarations.comments: Returns the five minute moving-average rate of the events recorded by the meter.
declarations.title: fiveMinuteRate

declarations.comments: Returns the one minute moving-average rate of the events recorded by the meter.
declarations.title: oneMinuteRate

declarations.comments: Returns the mean rate of the events recorded by the meter.
declarations.title: meanRate

declarations.comments: Returns the count of the events recorded by the meter.
declarations.title: count

declarations.comments: Returns the summary of the measurements in the meter.
declarations.title: read

declarations.comments: A timer is a histogram of the duration of a type of event and a meter of the rate of its occurrence.
declarations.title: Timer

declarations.comments:
Summary of the measurements in the meter. Contains:

- duration: the summary of the underlying event duration histogram.
- rate: the summary of the underlying event rate meter.
declarations.title: Summary

declarations.comments: Creates a new timer.
declarations.title: new

declarations.comments: Updates the timer with the duration of a new event.
declarations.title: update

declarations.comments:
Runs and times the given function, updates the given timer with the run duration, and returns
the return value of the function.
declarations.title: time

declarations.comments: Returns the fifteen minute moving average rate of the events recorded by the timer.
declarations.title: fifteenMinuteRate

declarations.comments: Returns the five minute moving average rate of the events recorded by the timer.
declarations.title: fiveMinuteRate

declarations.comments: Returns the one minute moving average rate of the events recorded by the timer.
declarations.title: oneMinuteRate

declarations.comments: Returns the mean rate of the events recorded by the timer.
declarations.title: meanRate

declarations.comments: Clears the timer.
declarations.title: clear

declarations.comments: Returns the percentiles of the measurements in the timer for the given percentiles array.
declarations.title: percentiles

declarations.comments: Returns the mean of the measurements in the timer.
declarations.title: mean

declarations.comments: Returns the standard deviation of the measurements in the timer.
declarations.title: stdDev

declarations.comments: Returns the minimum of the measurements in the timer.
declarations.title: min

declarations.comments: Returns the maximum of the measurements in the timer.
declarations.title: max

declarations.comments: Returns the sum of the measurements in the timer.
declarations.title: sum

declarations.comments: Returns the count of the measurements in the timer.
declarations.title: count

declarations.comments: Returns the summary of the measurements in the timer.
declarations.title: read
